Verses: 1 naan Thudhikkum Dhevane, Mavunamaayiraadheyum.
2 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vaayum, Kabattuvaayum, Enakku Virodhamaai Thirandhirukkiradhu; Kalla Naavinaal Ennode Pesugiraargal.
3 pagaiyundaakkum Vaarththaigalaal Ennai Soozhndhukondu, Mugaandharamillaamal Ennode Porseygiraargal.
4 en Sinegaththukku Badhilaaga Ennai Virodhikkiraargal, Naano Jebampannikkondirukkiren.
5 nanmaikku Badhilaaga Enakku Theemaiseygiraargal, En Sinegaththukku Badhilaaga Ennai Pagaikkiraargal.
6 avanukku Melaaga Dhushtanai Erpaduththivaiyum, Saaththaan Avan Valadhupakkaththil Nirpaanaaga.
7 avan Niyaayam Visaarikkappadumpodhu Kutravaaliyaagakkadavan; Avan Jebam Paavamaagakkadavadhu.
8 avan Naatkal Konjamaagakkadavadhu; Avan Uththiyogaththai Veroruvan Perakkadavan.
9 avan Pillaigal Thikkatravargalum, Avan Manaivi Vidhavaiyumaagakkadavargal.
10 avan Pillaigal Alaindhu Thirindhu Pichchaiyeduththu, Thangal Paazhaana Veedugalilirundhu Irandhunnakkadavargal.
11 kadan Koduththavan Avanukku Ulladhellaavatraiyum Abagariththukkolvaanaaga; Avan Pirayaasaththin Balanai Anniyar Pariththukkollakkadavargal.
12 avanukku Oruvarum Irakkang Kaanbiyaamalum, Avanudaiya Thikkatra Pillaigalukku Dhayavuseyyaamalum Povaargalaaga.
13 avan Sandhadhiyaar Nirmoolamaagakkadavargal; Irandaanthalaimuraiyil Avargal Per Atruppovadhaaga.
14 avan Pidhaakkalin Akkiramam Karththarukku Munbaaga Ninaikkappadakkadavadhu, Avan Thaayin Paavam Neengaamaliruppadhaaga.
15 avaigal Niththamum Karththarukku Munbaaga Irukkakkadavadhu; Avargal Per Boomiyiliraamal Nirmoolamaavadhaaga.
16 avan Dhayaiseyya Ninaiyaamal, Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanai Thunbappaduththi, Manamurivullavanai Kolaiseyyumpadi Thedinaane.
17 saabaththai Virumbinaan, Adhu Avanukku Varum; Avan Aaseervaadhaththai Virumbaamarponaan, Adhu Avanukku Dhooramaai Vilagippom.
18 saabaththai Avan Thanakku Angiyaaga Uduththikkondaan; Adhu Avan Ullaththil Thanneeraippolavum, Avan Elumbugalil Enneyaippolavum Paayum.
19 adhu Avan Moodikkollugira Vasthiramaagavum, Niththamum Kattikkollugira Kachchaiyaagavum Iruppadhaaga.
20 idhudhaan Ennai Virodhikkiravargalukkum, En Aaththumaavukku Virodhamaai Theengu Pesugiravargalukkum Karththaraal Varum Balan.
21 aandavaraagiya Karththaave, Neer Umadhu Naamaththinimiththam Ennai Aadhariththu, Umadhu Kirubai Nalamaanadhinaal, Ennai Viduviththarulum.
22 naan Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavan, En Irudhayam Enakkul Kuththundirukkiradhu.
23  Saayum Nizhalaippol Agandru Ponen; Vettukkiliyaippol Parakkadikkappadugiren.
24 ubavaasaththinaal En Muzhangaalgal Thalarchchiyadaigiradhu; En Maamsam Bushtiyatru Ularndhu Pogiradhu.
25 naan Avargalukku Nindhaiyaanen; Avargal Ennai Paarththu, Thangal Thalaiyaith Thulukkugiraargal.
26 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Enakku Sagaayampannum; Umadhu Kirubaiyinpadi Ennai Ratchiyum.
27 idhu Umadhu Karam Endrum, Karththaave, Dhevareer Idhai Seydheer Endrum, Avargal Arivaargalaaga.
28  Avargal Sabiththaalum, Neer Aaseervadhiyum; Avargal Ezhumbinaalum Vetkappattuppovaargalaaga; Umadhu Adiyaano Magizhakkadavan.
29 en Virodhigal Lachchaiyaal Moodappattu, Thangal Vetkaththai Saalvaiyaippol Thariththukkollakkadavargal.
30 karththarai Naan En Vaayinaal Migavum Thudhiththu, Anegar Naduvile Avarai Pugazhuven.
31 aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkiravargalinindru Eliyavanudaiya Aaththumaavai Ratchikkumpadi Avar Avan Valadhupaarisaththil Nirpaar.
